ValidationRule.description: Make sure there is at least one value selected for the Contract Sending Method field for a Full Insured Won Opportunity.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK ( Contract_Sending_Method__c ) && TEXT ( StageName ) = 'Closed Won' && TEXT ( Account.Funding_Type__c ) = 'Fully Insured' && RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Assumptive_Renewal'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Field is required to move to Closed/Won.
